/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses are seen in motion, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, providing a sense of order amidst the urban hustle and bustle.
